comment.body: Another way to share a video is to use http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit
People would have to spend more time and have discipline to tag their content properly before posting.

I was interested in this OS too, but thanks for Your review. I hope it will not be my next OS. Thinking i should rather stay with Debian or Arch based OS due to their large package repositories, and big communities.
